Verses: 1 avargal Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Ulle Konduvandhapodhu, Dhaaveedhu Adharkup Potta Koodaaraththin Naduve Avargal Adhai Vaiththu, Dhevanudaiya Sannidhiyil Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Seluththinaargal.
2 dhaaveedhu Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Seluththith Theerndhapinbu, Avan Janaththaik Karththarudaiya Naamaththile Aaseervadhiththu,
3 purushar Thodangi Sthreegalmattum, Isravelaraagiya Anaivarukkum Avaravarukku Ovvoru Appaththaiyum Ovvoru Iraichchith Thundaiyum, Ovvorupadi Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Pangittuk Koduththaan.
4 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaraip Prasthaabampannith Thudhiththup Pugazhugiradharku Karththarudaiya Pettikku Munbaaga Sevikkaththakka Leviyaril Silarai Niyamiththaan.

5 avargalil Aasaab Thalaivanum, Sagariyaa Avanukku Irandaavadhumaayirundhaan; Eyel, Semiramodh, Yegiyel, Maththiththiyaa, Eliyaab, Penaayaa, Obedhedhom, Eyel Enbavargal Thamburu Suramandalam Ennum Keedhavaaththiyangalai Vaasikkavum, Aasaab Kaiththaalangalaik Kottavum,
6 penaayaa, Yaagaasiyel Ennum Aasaariyar Eppodhum Dhevanudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettikku Munbaagap Poorigaigalai Oodhavum Niyamikkappattaargal.
7 appadi Aarambiththa Annaaliledhaane Karththarukkuth Thudhiyaagap Paadumpadi Dhaaveedhu Aasaappidaththilum Avan Sagodhararidaththilum Koduththa Sangeedhamaavadhu:
8 karththaraith Thudhiththu, Avarudaiya Naamaththaip Prasthaabamaakkungal; Avarudaiya Seygaigalai Janangalukkulle Prasiththappaduththungal.
9 avaraip Paadi, Avaraik Keerththanampanni, Avarudaiya Adhisayangalaiyellaam Dhyaaniththup Pesungal.
10 avarudaiya Parisuththa Naamaththaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattungal; Karththaraith Thedugiravargalin Irudhayam Magizhvadhaaga.
11 karththaraiyum Avar Vallamaiyaiyum Naadungal; Avar Samugaththai Niththamum Thedungal.
12 avarudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Isravelin Sandhadhiye! Avaraal Therindhukollappattavargalaagiya Yaakkobin Puththirare!
13 avar Seydha Adhisayangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum, Avar Vaakkin Nyaayaththeerppugalaiyum Ninaivukoorungal.
14 avare Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar; Avarudaiya Nyaayaththeerppugal Boomiyengum Vilangum.
15 aayiranthalaimuraikkendru Avar Kattalaiyitta Vaakkaiyum, Aabiragaamode Avar Pannina Udanpadikkaiyaiyum,
16 avar Eesaakkukku Itta Aanaiyaiyum Endrendraikkum Ninaiththirungal.
17 adhai Yaakkobukkup Pramaanamaagavum, Isravelukku Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaagavum Urudhippaduththi:
18 ungal Sudhandharapaagamaaga Kaanaan Dhesaththai Unakkuth Tharuven Endraar.
19 akkaalaththil Avargal Konjaththogaikkutpatta Sorpajanangalum Paradhesigalumaayirundhaargal.
20 avargal Oru Janaththai Vittu Maru Janaththandaikkum, Oru Raajyaththai Vittu Maru Dhesaththaarandaikkum Ponaargal.
21 avargalai Yodukkumpadi Oruvarukkum Idankodaamal, Avargal Nimiththam Raajaakkalaik Kadindhukondu:
22 naan Abishegampanninavargalai Neengal Thodaamalum, Ennudaiya Theerkkadharisigalukkuth Theenguseyyaamalum Irungal Endraar.
23 boomiyin Sagala Kudigale, Karththaraippaadi, Naalukkunaal Avarudaiya Ratchippai Suviseshamaai Ariviyungal.
24 jaadhigalukkul Avarudaiya Magimaiyaiyum, Sagala Janangalukkullum Avarudaiya Adhisayangalaiyum Vivariththuchchollungal.
25 karththar Periyavarum Migavum Thudhikkappadaththakkavarumaayirukkiraar; Ellaa Dhevargalilum Bayappadaththakkavar Avare.
26 sagala Janangaludaiya Dhevargalum Vikkiragangaldhaane; Karththaro Vaanangalai Undaakkinavar.
27 magimaiyum Ganamum Avar Samugaththil Irukkiradhu; Vallamaiyum Magizhchchiyum Avar Sthalaththil Irukkiradhu.
28 janangalin Vamsangale, Karththarukku Magimaiyaiyum Vallamaiyaiyum Seluththungal; Karththarukke Adhai Seluththungal.
29 karththarukku Avarudaiya Naamaththirkuriya Magimaiyai Seluththi, Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvandhu, Avarudaiya Sannidhiyil Pravesiyungal; Parisuththa Alangaaraththudane Karththaraith Thozhudhukollungal.
30 poologaththaare, Neengal Yaavarum Avarukku Munbaaga Nadungungal; Avar Poochchakkaraththai Asaiyaadhapadikku Urudhippaduththugiravar.
31 vaanangal Magizhndhu, Boomi Poorippadhaaga; Karththar Raajarigampannugiraar Endru Jaadhigalukkulle Sollappaduvadhaaga.
32 samuththiramum Adhin Niraivum Muzhangi, Naadum Adhilulla Yaavum Kalikooruvadhaaga.
33 appozhudhu Karththarukku Munbaagak Kaattuvirutchangalum Kembeerikkum; Avar Boomiyai Nyaayantheerkka Varugiraar.
34 karththaraith Thudhiyungal, Avar Nallavar, Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.

35 engal Ratchippin Dhevane, Naangal Umadhu Parisuththa Naamaththaip Potri, Ummaith Thudhikkiradhinaal Menmaipaaraattumpadikku, Engalai Ratchiththu, Engalai Serththukkondu, Jaadhigalukku Engalai Neengalaakkiyarulumendru Sollungal.
36 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Sadhaakaalangalilum Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga, Adharku Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollik Karththaraith Thudhiththaargal.

37 pinbu Pettikku Munbaaga Niththam Andraadaga Muraiyaai Sevikkumpadi, Avan Ange Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettikku Munbaaga Aasaappaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaiyum, Obedhedhomaiyum, Avargaludaiya Sagodhararaagiya Arubaththettupperaiyum Vaiththu,
38 edhiththoonin Kumaaranaagiya Indha Obedhedhomaiyum Osaavaiyum Vaasalkaakkiravargalaaga Vaiththaan.

39 kibiyonilulla Mettin Melirukkira Karththarudaiya Vaasasthalaththirku Munbaaga Irukkira Sarvaanga Thaganapalipeedaththinmel Sarvaanga Thaganangalai Niththamum, Andhisandhiyil Karththar Isravelukkuk Karpiththa Nyaayappramaanaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiyellaam Karththarukku Seluththuvadharkaaga,
40 ange Avan Aasaariyanaagiya Saadhokkaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Aasaariyaraiyum Vaiththu,
41 ivargalodunkooda Emaanaiyum, Edhiththoonaiyum, Perperaagak Kuriththuth Therindhukollappatta Matra Silaraiyum Karththarudaiya Kirubai Endrumulladhu Endru Avaraith Thudhikkavum,

42 poorigaigalaiyum Kaiththaalangalaiyum Dhevanaip Paadugiradharkuriya Keedhavaaththiyangalaiyum Thonikkachcheyyavum Avargaludan Emaanaiyum Edhiththoonaiyum Vaiththu, Edhiththoonin Kumaararai Vaasalkaakkiravargalaagak Kattalaiyittaan.
43 pinbu Janangal Ellaarum Avaravar Thangal Veettirkup Ponaargal; Dhaaveedhum Than Veettaarai Aaseervadhikkaththirumbinaan.
